title: Beano Comic Font
content:
Does anybody know the font used for this Beano header? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130070656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/8d1b7af9aa3b15ef4f9c29b55ce8adca_5261.42520.jpg)
author: smallfish

comments.content:
You can create a treatment like this from almost any sans font. Just flipping through the Font Book I see several with round O's. [Freight](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130070656/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/garagefonts/freight_sans/?&sample_text=Beano) even has real Small Caps.

- Mike Yanega
